title: Dark street at night
description: This street has very poor lighting at night. It's difficult to see and feels unsafe when walking alone.

title: Well-lit park area
description: This park has excellent lighting and security cameras. Feels very safe even in the evening.

title: Witnessed theft at corner store
description: I saw someone shoplifting from this corner store. The staff seemed to be aware but powerless to stop it. Be cautious with your belongings.

title: Friendly neighborhood
description: This area is very community-oriented with neighbors looking out for each other. I always feel safe walking here.

title: Verbal harassment incident
description: I was verbally harassed by someone at this location. There weren't many people around to help at the time.

title: Secure shopping area
description: This shopping center has visible security personnel and feels very secure. Well-lit parking lots too.

title: Poorly maintained area
description: This area has a lot of abandoned buildings and broken windows. It doesn't feel safe, especially after dark.

title: Late-night safety concern
description: A lot of intoxicated people gather here late at night. Can be intimidating if you're alone.
